componentAttributes.title: Welcome to the Revenue Operations Experience

componentAttributes.richTextValue:
The New RevOps KNOWLEDGE BASE is now available!!!


Use this form to submit a case to the Revenue Operations team.

Once the case is submitted, you will receive an auto-response email. You can continue to communicate with the RevOps team or add more recipients to the case by replying back to the auto-response.


Please populate every mandatory field:


Subject: a brief description of the issue


Priority: urgency of the issue 

(P3 - Normal, P2 - Important, P1 - Urgent)


What can we help with:  select the main topic of this issue is related to.



Reporting & Analysis: Reports, dashboards, analysis, adjustments EMRR, New MRR, ACV, TCV

Pricing & Quote help: CPQ, Quote, Pricing, Packing, QuickFix, Contract Amendment, Order form execution, Word file requests 

Sales Tools & Permissions: Sales tools, inbound lead routing, salesforce permissions, automation

Traning & Onboarding: Training, onboarding and documentation

Changes to records: Updates to records, merge records, delete records

Deal Registration: for Accedo One Deal Registrations

Deal Agreement Inquiries: Agreement (e.g. MSA, DPA, SOW) Review, Redlines & Assignments, RFPs, Custom Legal Notes, BYOP Requests, Extensions, Code of Conduct & ESG

InfoSec/Security Questions: Security Questionnaires


Description: please provide a detailed description of the issue.


Please include the URL to salesforce records (account, opportunities, quotes ...) related to this issue. The more information you can give, the fastest the Revenue Operation team can help. 


To check the progress of your cases, click on the "My Cases" from the menu on the top page. You will be able to see cases currently still open, and cases closed.



** Note: questions about commisions should be addressed from within the XActly app available via Okta.

componentAttributes.confirmationMessageDescription: You'll hear back from us soon.
componentAttributes.deflectionNotHelpful: Didn't find what you're looking for?
